about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in action-packed gameplay, where procedurally generated levels, and ever-evolving horrifying enemies adapt to your playstyle.

In Story Mode uncover the origins of these scary 2D creatures and defeat them to unlock new items, levels, and enemies for Arena Mode.

Arena Mode allows you to customize levels, enemies, item drops, difficulty, and more to tailor your gaming experience.



Your gameplay will evolve into unique experiences from the procedurally altered levels, environmental hazards, and randomized item spawns, allowing multiple fresh playthroughs.

Created by a passionate solo developer this game offers a survival horror experience like no other.



Key features:

  • action packed gameplay
  • enemies that evolve depending on how you play the game
  • procedurally altered levels making each playthrough unique
  • destructible environments
  • unlocks and upgrades after you beat a level
  • different game modes including story and arena mode that allows you to customize levels
  • graphic settings, key rebinding, post processing effects settings, optimization settings, audio settings
  • 14 different language selections including: English, Chinese, French, German, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Spanish, Korean, Russian, Polish, Thai, Vietnamese, and Indonesian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Armed with a diverse arsenal of weapons battle through ever-changing mazes and confront eerie, evolving 2D enemies in a pulse-pounding survival horror action-packed experience.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Vietnamese, Hindi
